description: Informal submission with custom structure using **Field:** pattern (no labels) - triggers HIGH confidence (close).
title: Add: awesome-resource
body:
## Resource Information

**Name:** awesome-resource

**URL:** https://github.com/username/awesome-resource

**Author:** Username (https://github.com/username)

**Category:** Agent Skills > General

**Description:** This is an awesome resource and I think it would be great to include. It has full testing and I recommend it. A curated collection of plugins with enforcement hooks, desktop notifications, and usage monitoring.

## Why it fits

A well-organized plugin collection with:
- **linter:** Enforcement hooks for security, cleanup, automatic linting, version syncing
- **notifier:** Desktop notifications showing current status
- **tracker:** Real-time usage display with progress bars
- Comprehensive documentation

## Additional context

The repository follows best practices and is actively maintained.
